Here listed are the ''major'' '''UK editions''' of '''''[[Unfinished Tales]]'''''.

==1980-1990==
<gallery mode="traditional" widths="125px" heights="125px">
File:Unfinished Tales 1980.png ‎|1980 hardcover
File:Unfinished Tales 1987-hb.png ‎|1980 hardcover 8th impression
File:Unfinished Tales 1982.png ‎|1982 paperback 
File:Unfinished Tales 1987-pb.png ‎|1982 paperback 9th impression
</gallery>
* [[1980]]: [[George Allen & Unwin]], hardcover, pp. 472. ISBN 0048231797 - (cover based on [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]'s artwork)
** 1980 hardcover edition, 8th impression ([[1987]])
* [[1982]]: Unicorn / Unwin Paperbacks, paperback, ISBN 0048232084 - (cover art by [[Roger Garland]])
** 1982 paperback edition, 9th impression ([[1987]])

==1990-2000==
<gallery mode="traditional" widths="125px" heights="125px">

* [[1992]]: [[HarperCollins]] hardcover ([[1992]]), ISBN 026110215X
* [[1993]]: [[HarperCollins]] paperback ([[1993]]), ISBN 0261102168 - (cover art by [[John Howe]])
* [[1998]]: [[HarperCollins]] paperback ([[1998]]), ISBN 0261103628
** 1998 paperback edition, 4th impression
** 1998 paperback edition, 6th impression ([[2004]]) - (cover based on [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]'s artwork)
** 1998 paperback edition, 18th? impression

==2000-2020==
<gallery mode="traditional" widths="125px" heights="125px">

File:Unfinished Tales 2006.png ‎‎|2006 hardcover

* [[2000]]: 1992 hardcover edition, reset in 2000 - (cover art by [[J.R.R. Tolkien]])
* [[2006]]: 2000 hardcover edition, reset in 2006
* [[2010]]: 1993 paperback edition, reset in 2010 - (cover art by [[Ted Nasmith]])
* [[2013]]: [[HarperCollins]] hardcover in slipcase, ISBN 0007542925
* [[2014]]: 1998 paperback edition, 37th? impression - (cover based on J.R.R. Tolkien's artwork)
* [[2014]]: 2010 paperback edition, 11th? impression

==Since 2020==
<gallery mode="traditional" widths="125px" heights="125px">
File:Unfinished Tales 2020.jpeg ‎|2020 hardcover
File:Unfinished Tales 2020 deluxe.png ‎|2020 hardcover deluxe edition
File:Unfinished Tales 2023.jpeg ‎|2023 hardcover

* [[2020]]: [[HarperCollins]] hardcover, ISBN 0008387958 - (illustrated by [[Alan Lee|A. L.]], [[John Howe|J. H.]], [[Ted Nasmith|T. N.]])
* [[2020]]: [[HarperCollins]] hardcover in slipcase, ISBN 0008387966 - (illustrated by A. L., J. H., T. N.)
* [[2023]]: [[HarperCollins]] hardcover with reversable dustjacket, ISBN 978-0008663131 - ([[Centenary Boxed Sets]] #1)
* [[2024]]: 2010 paperback edition, 18th impression
* [[2026]]: [[HarperCollins]] jacketless hardcover, ISBN 978-0008785697 - (collector's edition)
